content: these gauntlets are very simple and quick to knit and will make a good project for a knitter new to cables although the cable pattern may seem rather complicated the actual knitting is quite easy as all the cable crossings on each glove are formed identically the ribbed pattern is very stretchy and will accommodate most women s hands however it can also be easily scaled up by using thicker yarn and needles or by simply adding a few more stitches in 2x2 rib questions or comments about my designs interested in kals & mkals join **susanna ic** group on ravelry http //www ravelry com/groups/susanna-ic **french translation is available here ** http //melusinetricote com/traduction-swirling-gauntlets-susanna-ic/7240 thank you melusinetricote **spanish translation is available here ** http //kettlesandmittens blogspot com/2010/11/swirling-gauntlets-traduccion html thank you mjinbarcelona **swirling gauntlets kal** at obscuriosity group http //www ravelry com/discuss/obscuriosity/474306/1-25
